data.title: Standard A Main Hold Shear + Razorvine Combo
data.description: Combo your utility like so, to force and delay Attackers from successfully running out A Main.

data.title: Default Mid Shear Hold
data.description: Default this Mid Shear lineup to force more resources from Attackers.

data.title: Aggressive Mid Mail Arc Rose Contest
data.description: To peek Mid, use this Arc Rose lineup to fight for control. This also enables a teammate if they were to play from Vents, as it does not flash them.
